A single giant for Warmaster. I love the original Mrauder Giant miniature, even though I never had one.

Built it based on a Titancraft model, and added a couple of these:
https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/art/barril-para-impresion-3d
https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/game/pouch-lithoniel
https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/game/leather-belt-pouch-28mm-scale

2024.11.11 added a version with smaller head, because I am so indecisive

Join me on Patreon! patreon.com/yasashiikyojinstudio

Master crafters and organized warriors, fire giants dwell among volcanoes, lava floes, and rocky mountains. They are ruthless militaristic brutes whose mastery of metalwork is legendary.

Fire Giant for use in any epic adventure! Compatible with any tabletop role-playing games.

Both 32mm and 54mm scaling options provided!

If you like what I do and would like to support the creation of free minis for the whole community please consider joining my Patreon where you can get 50% OFF the entire store, vote for what I sculpt next, get early access to new designs, more variants, stat blocks, vtt tokens and a heap more!

Stone Giants were a reclusive race of giants that lived in underground and mountainous environments. Adults averaged about 18‚ÄØfeet (5.5‚ÄØmeters) in height and 1,700‚ÄØpounds (770‚ÄØkilograms) in weight.

Auril is a lesser god who embodies winters creulety. In her second form - The Maiden - Auril is a 10ft tall woman of ice. She crackles as she moves and blades of ice protrude from her body.

Auril's first form for use in any epic adventure! Compatible with D&D and tabletop role-playing games. Both 32mm and 54mm scaling options provided!

If you like what I do please consider joining my Patreon for $1 where you can get early access to new designs and vote for what I sculpt next!

patreon.com/yasashiikyojinstudio

item.title: [GRATUIT] Thingiverse > dutchmogul > Pocket_Tactics__Beheader [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:4598897

Id objet : 4598897

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • warmaster Bits Bits-cr√©atures-g√©antes G√©ants

Collections pour tags :

  • warmaster Bits Bits-cr√©atures-g√©antes G√©ants NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5

This Pocket-Tactics unit can be used as reinforcements for the Tribes of the Dark Forest faction (or in custom builds) and is for the new version of the game [currently on Kickstarter](https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/292543184/pocket-tactics), which has a couple of days left to go! The model is scaled for 15mm miniature gaming, and prints without support.

This new version wipes the slate in regard to previous editions (1-5), all of which are still available here on Thingiverse (and fully playable as they are). The full miniatures-based game will be commercially available after the Kickstarter wraps, but you can use this piece with the [free version available here](https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:4575264), and a meeple version is included, as well as a based and non-based version in standard/30mm scale. (Depending on your printer/settings, these versions may benefit from support, as the original was designed for 15mm scale.)

For those of you thinking about [supporting us on Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/illgottengames?fan_landing=true), our patrons get special weekly model releases, access to new storefront releases and our entire back catalog, plus licensing options to sell printed versions of our designs.

 3
 4
 5
 6
 7
 8
 9

Bugbear's are massive goblinoids, larger and stronger than both hobgoblins and goblins alike. They can easily be distinguished from other goblinoids by their thick coats of fur and immense size.

Bugbear for use in any epic adventure! Compatible with D&D and tabletop role-playing games. Set to 54mm scaling for easier printing and because bigger is better but you can reduce to 60% for 28-32mm scale

If you like what I do please consider joining my Patreon for $1 where you can vote for what I sculpt next!

https://www.patreon.com/yasashiikyojinstudio

***
Updated: April 2020

Ogres are hulking giants notorious for their quick tempers. Lashing out in a tantrum until it runs out of objects or creatures to smash.

Ogre for use in any epic dungeon! Compatible with D&D and tabletop roleplaying games. Set to 54mm scaling for easier printing and because bigger is better but you can reduce to 60% for 28-32mm scale

I made some minor changes to look more like underground trolls who are friends with moonworshipping goblins *wink*

- made the teeth smaller and the nose bigger
- added some "crystals" to the back and arms
- made the arms and torso smaller and the legs larger
- made the claws thicker and longer

Their fur stained with the blood of fallen foes, Minotaur's are massive, bull-headed humanoids whose roar is a savage battle cry that all civilized creatures fear.

For use in any epic adventure! Compatible with D&D and tabletop role-playing games. Updated to 54mm scaling for easier printing and because bigger is better but you can reduce to 60% for 28-32mm scale

If you like what I do please consider joining my Patreon for $1 where you can vote for what I sculpt next!

I made the model solid, resculpted most of the surface to add more detail and make it easier to print for FDM printers. Also detached the torch and added a pin.

I would like to make more changes and upgrades to this model. Please let me know what you like. Another weapon? Make him into an orc or an elf?

item.title: [GRATUIT] Thingiverse > dutchmogul > Cave_Lurker__15mm_scale_ [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:1667067

Id objet : 1667067

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • warmaster Bits Bits-cr√©atures-g√©antes G√©ants

Collections pour tags :

  • warmaster Bits Bits-cr√©atures-g√©antes G√©ants NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5

This model was designed based on [original art and concept by Adam Slivka](https://www.instagram.com/p/BHpixmfDGju/?taken-by=slivkastudio&hl=en), an artist who continually impresses me with their ideas and execution. If you want to print a 28mm scale version, just scale it up by 180%. A viewable render is available [on Sketchfab](https://skfb.ly/QytV).

We've set up a [Patreon page](https://www.patreon.com/illgottengames) for anyone who's interested in helping to fund us so we can keep making free and open sourced games like Pocket-Tactics, Wayfarer Tactics. and others, not to mention the growing catalog of gaming miniatures that you can use for whatever you want! (Psst... we take requests and commissions...)

Enjoy!
